import{createStore,applyMiddleware,combineReducers}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';const rootReducer=combineReducers({// your reducers
});const middleware=[thunk];const store=createStore(rootReducer,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(...middleware)));export default store;
